blogs.title: blog init
blogs.shortDescription: So this is the first application that I created using CRA. I've decided that I should focus more on the functionality than the design. Yep, css is really hard. Right now I am still checking out frontend development using these types of framework and I am really enjoying it. For now I am trying out and learning REACT but I look forward to checking out other js frameworks as well.
blogs.author: adzz
